Wiz-DM BOT 05-06-2024 04:12
Huddled together the group rests in the tomb. If it is night or day no one knows, only the darkness of the tomb and their own troubled thoughts pass the time. The group does manage to get to know their newest members a little better. Moa is a monk of a lost monastery whose goals were to find enlightenment through truth. Papazotl set himself up as an avian god among humans and lived the life of a deity. Wongo... Wongo likes to pull legs off spiders. The time passes without event, though at one point in the night there is the distant sound of rattling chains and heavy foot steps. They fade into silence before growing close. Despite no interruption to their rest the party can't help but feel they are being watched. Finally, once everyone is rested, the group pushes on, ready to delve deeper into the dangerous tomb. They know not what lies ahead, but are certain many perils await.
Wiz-DM BOT 06-06-2024 15:47
The group gathers and decides to descend to the next level. They gather themselves and back track through the wine room, finding their way to the staircase descending to level three of the tomb. Nagrom, even more perceptive with Papzotyl riding along. Spots a hidden secret door on the west wall, right at the top of the staircase. He does not see any signs of traps on the door.
